Row.Text: The Eternal Blue Sky commands all. Who dares to listen?
I am Genghis Khan. Are you friend or foe? For your sake, I hope a peace-seeking friend…
I am Genghis Khan. Are you friend or foe? For your sake, I hope a peace-seeking friend…
I am Genghis Khan. Are you friend or foe? For your sake, I hope a peace-seeking friend…
My enemy, I will not defeat you. I will annihilate your entire bloodline.
Ha! You attack me? You seek your own demise.
Tengri, have you forsaken me? Has my destiny failed?
Your words hold the wisdom of the divine.
